default264.name: default264
default264.command: -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i pulse -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 25 -async 1 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 24k -ar 22050 -maxrate 750k -bufsize 5000k -f flv

default264New.name: default264New
default264New.command: -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i pulse -vcodec libx264 -preset slow -tune zerolatency -r 25 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -maxrate 4500k -bufsize 9000k -f flv

raspberry_UsbCamLow.name: raspberry_UsbCamLow
raspberry_UsbCamLow.command: -f video4linux2 -s qvga -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i default:CARD=U0x46d0x825 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -async 1 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 24k -ar 22050 -maxrate 750k -bufsize 5000k -f flv

raspberry_UsbCamMed.name: raspberry_UsbCamMed
raspberry_UsbCamMed.command: -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i default:CARD=U0x46d0x825 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -async 1 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 5000k -f flv

raspberry_UsbCamMed_25fps.name: raspberry_UsbCamMed_25fps
raspberry_UsbCamMed_25fps.command: -f video4linux2 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i default:CARD=U0x46d0x825 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 25 -async 1 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 5000k -f flv

raspberry_UsbCamHigh.name: raspberry_UsbCamHigh
raspberry_UsbCamHigh.command: -f video4linux2 -s hd720 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i default:CARD=U0x46d0x825 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -async 1 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -maxrate 4000k -bufsize 8000k -f flv

raspberry_UsbCamHigh_25fps.name: raspberry_UsbCamHigh_25fps
raspberry_UsbCamHigh_25fps.command: -f video4linux2 -s hd720 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i default:CARD=U0x46d0x825 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 25 -async 1 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -maxrate 4000k -bufsize 8000k -f flv

default264Speakers.name: default264Speakers
default264Speakers.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f pulse -i alsa_output.0.analog-stereo.monitor -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 25 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -maxrate 1500k -bufsize 3000k -f flv

testVideoAndMp3PipeIn.name: testVideoAndMp3PipeIn
testVideoAndMp3PipeIn.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 25 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -f flv

testVideoAndMp3PipeInFFlags.name: testVideoAndMp3PipeInFFlags
testVideoAndMp3PipeInFFlags.command: -f video4linux2 -fflags nobuffer -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -itsoffset -4.0 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 25 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -f flv

ytPipeInMp3.name: ytPipeInMp3
ytPipeInMp3.command: -f video4linux2 -fflags nobuffer -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -itsoffset -9.5 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 25 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -f flv

testVideoAndMp3PipeInAndFilter.name: testVideoAndMp3PipeInAndFilter
testVideoAndMp3PipeInAndFilter.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f flv

testVideoAndMp3PipeInWithOffset.name: testVideoAndMp3PipeInWithOffset
testVideoAndMp3PipeInWithOffset.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -itsoffset -3.5 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -f flv

testVideoAndMp3PipeInAndFilter2.name: testVideoAndMp3PipeInAndFilter2
testVideoAndMp3PipeInAndFilter2.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -itsoffset -2.15 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f flv

AlmostInSyncASUS.name: AlmostInSyncASUS
AlmostInSyncASUS.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f flv

AlmostInSyncASUS2.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -itsoffset -2.15 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -ar 44100 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -f flv

AlmostInSyncASUSyt.name: AlmostInSyncASUSyt
AlmostInSyncASUSyt.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -itsoffset -2.15 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f flv

AlmostInSyncASUSaltEncoder.command: -f video4linux2 -s vga -i /dev/video0 -f mp3 -itsoffset -2.15 -i pipe:0 -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency -r 15 -ar 44100 -maxrate 1000k -bufsize 2000k -filter_complex asyncts=first_pts=0:compensate=1:min_delta=0 -f flv
